trans-unit.source: Serializes an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to a new type.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityTypeCodeDomSerializer performs the same tasks as <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializer>, but if you use this class to serialize an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> it defines a new type.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ActivityTypeCodeDomSerializer 동일한 작업을 수행 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializer>, 하지만이 클래스를 사용 하 여 serialize 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>새 형식을 정의 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityTypeCodeDomSerializer"></xref> class.
Deserializes the specified type declaration.
The serialization manager to use for deserialization.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> to use for deserialization.
The deserialized <xref:System.Object>.
Returns the method where the statements used to serialize a member are stored.
trans-unit.target: 멤버 serialize에 사용 되는 문을 저장 되는 메서드를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned method is determined from a method key found in the user data associated with `typeDecl`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 되는 메서드는 연결 된 사용자 데이터에 있는 메서드 키에서 결정 됩니다 `typeDecl`합니다.

trans-unit.source: If there is no method key, GetInitializeMethod creates a new <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod>.
trans-unit.target: 키가 없는 메서드를 GetInitializeMethod에 새 <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod>.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod> 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager to use for serialization.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> to use for serialization.
The <xref:System.Object> to use for serialization.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod"></xref> used to emit all of the initialization code for the given member.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod"> </xref> 지정된 된 멤버에 대 한 모든 초기화 코드를 내보내는 데 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: manager, typeDecl, or value contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: managertypeDecl, 또는 value 에 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of methods to be interpreted during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 역직렬화 하는 동안 해석 될 메서드 배열을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager to use for serialization.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> to use for serialization.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod"></xref> array of methods to be interpreted during serialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod"> </xref> 직렬화 하는 동안 해석 될 메서드 배열을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: manager or typeDecl contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: manager또는 typeDecl 에 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified object by creating a new type declaration that defines that object.
trans-unit.target: 해당 개체를 정의 하는 새로운 형식 선언을 만들어 지정된 된 개체를 serialize 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager to use for serialization.
The <xref:System.Object> to serialize.
An optional collection of members.
Can be a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) or an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Null 참조일 수 있습니다 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> Visual basic에서) 또는 빈 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> that defines the specified object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"> </xref> 지정된 된 개체를 정의 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: manager or root contains a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: manager또는 root 에 null 참조 ().

trans-unit.source: root cannot be converted to an .
